Title: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 13 for SLE 15 SP4)

Notes.Text: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 13 for SLE 15 SP4)
Notes.Title: Topic

Notes.Text:
This update for the Linux Kernel 5.14.21-150400_24_66 fixes one issue.

The following security issue was fixed:

- CVE-2023-35788: Fixed an out-of-bounds write in the flower classifier code via TCA_FLOWER_KEY_ENC_OPTS_GENEVE packets in fl_set_geneve_opt in net/sched/cls_flower.c (bsc#1212509).
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Text: The CVRF data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
Notes.Title: Terms of Use

Relationships.RelatesToProductReference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Live Patching 15 SP4

Vulnerabilities.Description: An issue was discovered in fl_set_geneve_opt in net/sched/cls_flower.c in the Linux kernel before 6.3.7. It allows an out-of-bounds write in the flower classifier code via TCA_FLOWER_KEY_ENC_OPTS_GENEVE packets. This may result in denial of service or privilege escalation.
